decision_conditions: The proposed amendments to Condition 6 (Windows) of Planning Permission 24/01158/HOU would diminish the privacy of the neighbouring properties. The proposal is considered to be contrary to Policy D3 of the London Plan, 2021 and DM10 of the RBK Core Strategy and would therefore fail to ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers

description: Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 6 (Windows) for Application Reference Number: 24/01158/HOU (Erection of single storey rear extension and enlargement of the lower-ground floor and existing lightwell. Replacement of all existing windows to double-glazed, conservation-style painted timber sash windows. Installation of side access staircase and change from existing window to new door opening and panelled timber door to the ground floor to the side elevation. New window opening and conservation-style sash window to side elevation. Change from existing side access door opening to new conservation-style sash window to side elevation. Erection of side dormer roof and  replacement rear dormer roof extensions. Installation of timber ASHP and bin enclosure to side garden.) dated 02/08/2024. Variation to remove elements of the condition with regards to South aspect and removal of the obscured glazing condition for the North Aspect.
